result.purpose: Responsible for client authentication and external authentication service integration.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating authentication logic and configuration management in separate files.

pkg/xauth/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration structures for client authentication.

pkg/xauth/external_auth_svc.go.purpose: This file implements an external authentication service that exchanges authorization codes for access tokens.
side_effects: Logs an error if unable to exchange auth code
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information if error handling is not properly managed
